name: get_company_historical_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool stoxx.
Tool description: Retrieve live and historical information for publicly traded companies
API description: Provides access to daily historical company pricing data over a given period of months

A sample output for each day:
`{
"changePercent":0
"close":115.1465
"date":"2022-05-27"
"high":115.187
"low":112.628
"open":113.55
"symbol":"AMZN"
"updated":1654726813000
"volume":93660160
}`

ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol of the company to fetch historical data for.

months.description: The number of months of historical data to retrieve.
